name: pnp-powerplatform-samples-forem
title: Forem
shortDescription: This sample shows how you can use the Forem (Independent Publisher) connector.
longDescription: This sample shows how you can use the Forem (Independent Publisher) connector. In this case it shows the latest posts, posts about Azure and posts about .NET. In this example I used DevTo as the Forem instance. The sample also uses the Creator Kit - so make sure to install that before importing this sample!

references.name: Microsoft Power Platform documentation
references.description: Discover how to make the most of Microsoft Power Platform products with online training courses, docs, and videos covering product capabilities and how-to guides.

references.name: Creator Kit
references.description: The Creator Kit helps create Power Apps experiences on the web and mobile platforms with convenient components that are ubiquitous in modern software.

references.name: Dev.To
references.description: DEV Community is a community of amazing developers. A place where coders share, stay up-to-date and grow their careers.
